root: ^Matt, I've been informed you were running late today again...
^And you're not even doing the simple tasks assigned to you!? Not to mention the horrible state of your attire!? What do you have to say for yourself?

DamnRightItWontHappenAgain: ^You're damn right it won't happen again! You've completely disreguarded our company's policies. You're late, not wearing the correct uniform and you're busy slacking off!
^I have no need for a dead wieght employee. Pack your desk, you're fired.
excuseMe: ^DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA WHO YOU'RE TALKING TO MATT!?
Fired: ^Pack your desk and get out of my sight.
